name: Scribblox
description:
In Scribblox, you control cubes that can be joined Together, use WASD or arrow keys to move, space bar to join and R for reset. Made for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam.

Credits:

Fonts: Michael Tension,  Kevin Burke.

Textures: Fatih Bilhaq, JCW.

SFX: StarNinjas, Kenney, Fupi.

Everything else was made by me (Flyce_9998).
